name: Scrambled Eggs
steps: Beat eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cumin, and cayenne in medium bowl until blended.
Heat butter in large nonstick skillet over medium heat until melted. Pour in egg mixture, gently stirring as eggs begin to set.
Continue cooking -- pulling, lifting, and folding eggs -- until thickened and no visible liquid egg remains. Do not stir constantly. Remove from heat. Serve immediately.
